title: PlayStation Partners With Discord! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.03.21
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about PlayStation partnering with Discord, Returnal needing a save system, and a bunch of Xbox news.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:10 - Housekeeping
A whole bunch of content is live right now since Friday!
Kinda Funny XCast went live over the weekend with special guest Andrew Alliance! Parris is hosting and they’re talking all about Halo Infinite Cross Play.
Kinda Funny Podcast is live right now and it features Greg and Gen talking all about their pregnancy journey
A highlight video of me and Andy playing Resident Evil 7 is up right now edited by Roger Pokorny
Not to mention our reaction to the Invincible finale.
All of those are live on Youtube.com/KindaFunny and Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
The next 2 Tuesdays at 11AM PT right here on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames we are partnering with Razer to show off the RTX 30-series powered Blade laptops with Andy and the boys playing some Warzone
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack & Tom Bock
The Roper Report  -
00:04:33 - Housemarque hears your complaints about Returnal’s save system - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:12:10 - Breaking news: PlayStation Partners with Discord
Jim Ryan, President & CEO
00:18:50 - Konami is skipping E3 - Jordan Gerblick @ GamesRadar
00:30:30 - A whole bunch more games are getting FPS Boost on Xbox - Tom Warren @ The Verge
00:32:40 - Ad
00:35:28 - Speaking of Xbox: Xbox explored lowering its cut on games on its console store - Tom Warren @ The Verge
00:43:50 - More news from the court docs: Court documents have revealed Xbox’s internal Last of Us 2 review - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:46:50 - - Best Friends Q:BJ Bernardo
00:51:05 - Major Fighting Game Publishers Pull Out of WePlay-Sponsored Events - Moises Taveras @ Paste Magazine
00:53:40 - Out today
00:55:30 - Squad Up:Steve Saylor - Blind Gamer
https://stevesaylor.net/webbys
00:57:15 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Tim00:00:00 - Start

content:encoded:
Blessing and Tim talk about PlayStation partnering with Discord, Returnal needing a save system, and a bunch of Xbox news.


Time Stamps -

00:00:00 - Start

00:02:10 - Housekeeping

A whole bunch of content is live right now since Friday!

Kinda Funny XCast went live over the weekend with special guest Andrew Alliance! Parris is hosting and they’re talking all about Halo Infinite Cross Play.

Kinda Funny Podcast is live right now and it features Greg and Gen talking all about their pregnancy journey

A highlight video of me and Andy playing Resident Evil 7 is up right now edited by Roger Pokorny

Not to mention our reaction to the Invincible finale.

All of those are live on Youtube.com/KindaFunny and Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames

The next 2 Tuesdays at 11AM PT right here on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames we are partnering with Razer to show off the RTX 30-series powered Blade laptops with Andy and the boys playing some Warzone

Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack & Tom Bock
